abstract: The proposal would require advisers to supply plainly written brochures to supplement bare-bones information now available online.
snippet: The proposal would require advisers to supply plainly written brochures to supplement bare-bones information now available online.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON (Dow Jones)  Money managers in the United States would have to provide online brochures describing their services, fees, investment performance and potential conflicts of interest under a proposal approved Wednesday by the Securities and Exchange Commission.

headline.main: S.E.C. Asks Money Managers to Post Full Details on Web
headline.print_headline: S.E.C. Asks Money Managers To Post Full Details on Web

abstract: Stocks rallied on Wednesday, sending the Dow Jones industrials up nearly 180 points, after reports of an unexpected climb in January retail sales.
snippet: Stocks rallied on Wednesday, sending the Dow Jones industrials up nearly 180 points, after reports of an unexpected climb in January retail sales.
lead_paragraph: Stocks rallied on Wednesday, sending the Dow Jones industrials up nearly 180 points, after the Commerce Department released some unexpected positive economic news: a climb in retail sales for January.

headline.main: Surprising Retail Sales Lift the Gloom, for a Day
headline.print_headline: Surprising Retail Sales Lift the Gloom, for a Day

abstract: A Chinese department store operator, Maoye International Holdings, has hired two more investment banks to underwrite its postponed Hong Kong initial public offering, according to Dow Jones.
lead_paragraph: A Chinese department store operator, Maoye International Holdings, has hired two more investment banks to underwrite its postponed Hong Kong initial public offering, according to Dow Jones.

headline.main: Chinese Retailer Said to Bring HSBC and UBS on Board for I.P.O.
